The email from Rite: Hite owner Mike White warning employees of personal consequences if Obama were re-elected.
The claim that Rite: Hite's tax rate is the highest personal tax rate and that their planned tax rate would increase to roughly 65 percent under Obama's re-election.
The verification of Rite: Hite's tax status as a Subchapter S corporation for taxes, which means their corporate tax rate is the highest personal tax rate.
